hResourcesDataUK.featuredSentenceUk: "Over the course of our first six months with Wunderkind, we’ve been impressed by the results and feel very supported by the Wunderkind team. We’re seeing a 12X return on spend, which far exceeds our forecast. Our onsite identification rates also rose significantly, to 21% of site traffic, which aids in more productive retargeting and revenue capture efforts... All said, our rigorous evaluation landed us with a highly effective partner, and a team that comprehends, internalizes, and executes on the Sonos goals."
